title: Laundry Facility, Refrigerator, Central A/C & Heat
posting_body: ['Villas at Rowland Heights', '18600 Colima Road, Rowland Heights, CA, 91748', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 116', 'OR Text', '116', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'The Villas at Rowland Heights Apartments in Rowland Heights, CA', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 600 Sq.', 'Ft.', "The Villa's at Rowland Heights 55+ Senior Community offers its residents an enriched lifestyle, a selection of luxurious rental homes, impeccable service, appealing amenities and an outstanding location.", 'Oscar Wilde said, "I\'m a person of simple tastes.', 'I\'m satisfied with only the best."', "Consider The Villa's at Rowland Heights your finest choice.", 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants- BRE #1525033', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Refrigerator', '- Central A/C & Heat', '- Window Covering', '- Spacious Closets', '- Carpet or Vinyl Flooring.', '- Gas Stove', '- Crown Molding in selected Units', '- Pet Friendly', '- Cable or Satellite Ready', '- Patio or Balcony', '- Custom paint throughout', '- Dishwasher', 'Community Amenities', '- Laundry Facility', '- Library and 4 Centrally Located Laundry Facilities on Site', '- Off Street Parking', '- Close to Dining, Shopping, and Public Transportation', '- Controlled Access', '- Public Transportation', '- Sparkling & heated pool and spa', '- Fitness Center', '- Club House', '- Disability Access', '- Freeway Access', '- Pets Allowed', 'Office Hours', 'Monday to Sunday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly Community', '*Breed and Weight Restrictions Apply', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'FbqnUpU1']
